rules.description: Map CapsLock to RightShift+RightAlt
Neovide: CapsLock + i - create-neovide
Terminal: CapsLock + a - create-terminal
yabai: CapsLock + h - focus west/south/north/west
yabai: CapsLock + alt + w - warp recent
yabai: CapsLock + alt + s - swap recent
yabai: CapsLock + alt + m - move window to recent
yabai: CapsLock + alt + h - swap west/south/north/west
yabai: CapsLock + 0 - balance size of windows
yabai: CapsLock +  v - create desktop and follow focus
yabai: CapsLock + alt + v - create desktop, move window and follow focus
yabai: CapsLock + x - destroy desktop and goto recent space
yabai: CapsLock + w - close window
yabai: CapsLock + r - goto recent space
yabai: CapsLock + p - goto prev space

to.shell_command: yabai -m space --focus prev || yabai -m space --focus last

rules.description: yabai: CapsLock + n - goto next space

to.shell_command: yabai -m space --focus next || yabai -m space --focus first

rules.description: yabai: CapsLock + alt + p - move to prev space
yabai: CapsLock + n - move to next space
yabai: CapsLock + $number - goto space $number
yabai: CapsLock + f - toggle fullscreen
yabai: CapsLock + t - toggle float
Alone Ctrl And Command to Esc for Other
Alone Ctrl And Command to Esc for Term
Swap Ctrl Number and Command Number for Term
Swap Ctrl Tab and Command Tab for Term
Swap Ctrl C and Command C for Term
Swap Ctrl V and Command V for Term
Swap Ctrl Shift C and Command Shift C For Term
Swap Ctrl Space and Command Space For Term
Swap Ctrl+Shift Space and Command+Shift Space For Term
